title: I can't use hextech items
body:
First time noticing this after patch 7.11

I am able to click and highlight my hextech box with the regular option of opening it. For any of the other hextech items (champions/skins) I am not able to highlight or access any option when I click them. I am able to hover my clicker over the item (e.g. morgana champion shard) and see the RP and Blue Essence value to it but it does not allow me to actually click the item and do anything with it.

I'd like to solve this because I have no way of using hextech right now.

replies.body: This sounds really strange, but it could be due to a connection problem struggling to communicate your fusion (or transactions) to our servers.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewalls in case something is specifically blocking that from happening.  Should it continue, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to clear up any blocks or instability along the way.  Let me know if it helps!
everything is as normal after restarting the client
